channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 07:43 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creat by further reports.
item.description: 游릭 07:43 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creat by further reports.#Chernihiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 07:37 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lajpetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 07:37 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lajpetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
